mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users( username, password, name, email, email_notification_enabled ) VALUES (#{username}, #{password}, #{name}, #{email}, #{emailNotificationEnabled})
mapper.select: SELECT id, username, password, name, email, email_notification_enabled as emailNotificationEnabled, created_at FROM users WHERE username = #{username}
SELECT id, username, password, name, email, email_notification_enabled as emailNotificationEnabled, created_at FROM users WHERE id = #{id}
SELECT id, username, password, name, email, email_notification_enabled as emailNotificationEnabled, created_at FROM users WHERE email = #{email}
